All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ActionMessage
This class represents a message of the Command Pattern.
ActionTranslator
This singleton class is basically a map of lambdas that the graphical game objects use to translate the drag and drop movement into a network action.
AnimationHandler
This class represents a collection of drawable objects called every CONSTANT time in milliseconds to update the animation status.
Answer
 
AssistantCard
This class represents the assistant card.
AssistantCardsUpdate
 
BaseGameAction
Represents the actions that the basic FSM game can understand, accept and/or reject
Centaur
Character card Centaur.
CharacterCard
This class defines the abstraction of a Character card.
CharacterCardActionMessage
Message related to the activation of the character card effect.
CharacterCardPayloadUpdate
This class has 2 optionals because a character card can have as a payload a number of students or a number of entry tiles.
CharacterCardsUpdate
 
CharacterCardType
Enumeration of the character cards type
CharacterType

This class represents a cloud tile.

CloudType
